texts.text: Additional functionality: Reactivate during <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> to charge a short distance on the target direction, if it collides with an enemy perform the hit sequence
subtexts: 3.5 range the same as the base Range
Phases through walls if it's casted inside one
If it's cast inside a unit or structure will automatically be placed on the closest valid position to double hit it

general.developerCommentary: I like both <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> and <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> but with some old kits being more dash and mobility centered Artanis itself got his kit a little old in that sense. I want to hold the current principles but add more control to the Player so the same won't feel overwhelmed for the lack of option. Besides i am trying to make my loved hero be able to escape ganks without needing to resort on trying a 2v1 situation...please delete tracer. But talking for real, he is one of the few solo laners that has a deprecated way of escaping ganks.

texts.text: Unstoppable will now be granted during the swap time and 0.25 after it
subtexts: Cancelling mid swap will make the unstoppable effect worn off earlier

general.developerCommentary: I like both <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> and <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> but with some old kits being more dash and mobility centered Artanis itself got his kit a little old in that sense. I want to hold the current principles but add more control to the Player so the same won't feel overwhelmed for the lack of option. Besides i am trying to make my loved hero be able to escape ganks without needing to resort on trying a 2v1 situation...please delete tracer. But talking for real, he is one of the few solo laners that has a deprecated way of escaping ganks.

texts.text: Will occupy a (?) slot
Artanis dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy. Upon impact will strike the enemy with two basic attacks(Shares cooldown and talent effects with <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1>)
subtexts: 2 cast range Artanis basic attack has 1.25 range
3.5 distance dash the equivalent of <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> distance
It will work similar to Yasuo Sweeping Blade from League of Legends

general.developerCommentary: Within the same argumento on reactivating <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> on <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> , i want to make Artanis tools of mobility a reality.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0> renamed to Zealot Parry

texts.text: Changed functionality: When Artanis activates <modified, abilities, basic, 1> he negates basic attacks damage for 1.25 seconds. 20% of the damage negated will be added to you next <modified, abilities, basic, 0> first dash

changes.developerCommentary: I want to make Parry a real thing.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Resets cooldown and refunds mana if the target was killed by <modified, abilities, basic, 1>,
subtexts: Has a 0.35 extra time to count the kill.

changes.developerCommentary: This is one of the two only talents that improve Artanis PVE aspects directly. I just see a chance here to make it a fun experience with the new <modified, abilities, basic, 3>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Hitting an enemy Hero with <modified, abilities, basic, 1> reduces it's cooldown by 4 and grant a stacking 8% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. Can only occur once every 7 seconds per Hero.

changes.developerCommentary: I dislike how in general infinite quests incentivize players to play and especially on Artanis aspects it just make players goddamn maniacs and with that in mind i want players to be maniacs but without the pressure of losing the ding value

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: For me Artanis has enough defensive talents to be tweaked with

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Grant 20% of the Shield Overload's Shields to nearby allied heros

changes.developerCommentary: By watching some campaign maps again i forgot that Artanis had a skill that he could use to heal allied heroes and shield them. I want to bring that aspect back while make it a viable talent for other reasons when close to <vanilla, talents, 13, 3>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 3>

texts.text: Moved from level 13
Reduced to 35 spell armor

changes.developerCommentary: I want to handle level 4 as the Shield level and giving a little nerf for being an earlier contender

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Refreshs cooldown if hit the target with Twin Blades within 2 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: By removing <vanilla, talents , 13, 2> i wanted to hold the way of how some Artanis players were close swap maniacs and with the new <modified, talents, 1, 2> works i think it will be a great combo

changes.name: NEW: Shield Force

texts.text: Activate to destroy your current Shield and deal damage 50% of the value as damage to enemies nearby and knock back them
subtexts: Radius 3.0 same from Dehaka Luker Strain
Knockback duration: 0.25 same from Dehaka Luker Strain
Knockback speed: 10 same from Dehaka Luker Strain

changes.developerCommentary: This is a talent i always wanted Artanis to have i really dunno about how the numbers would work specially with how the <modified, talents, 4, 2> works

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: Moved from level 13

changes.developerCommentary: I want to make this talent a contender with a lot of big DPS talents and better control what you pick at level 13

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 0>

texts.text: Moved to level 13

changes.developerCommentary: Making level 13 the <modified, abilities, basic, 0> level

texts.text: Removed

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Reduces <modified, abilities, basic, 0> mana cost to 25. Hitting 3 enemy heroes with the first dash from <modified, abilities, basic, 0> reduces its cooldown to 0.3 . <modified, abilities, basic, 0> can be cast while on <modified, abilities, basic, 0>

changes.developerCommentary: This talent is intended to cause nauseas on Artanis players with the number of <modified, abilities, basic, 0> you will be able to perform

changes.name: NEW: Aiur reinforcements

texts.text: For each enemy hero hit by <modified, abilities, basic, 0> reduces Artanis Heroic cooldown by 5%

changes.developerCommentary: I didn't want to upgrade ultimates because i feel them are strong but at the same time i kinda wanted. So this is a indirect ultimate buff for the possibility of taking a nano boost and performing two lasers.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: Moved to level 13

changes.developerCommentary: Making level 13 a <modified, abilities, basic, 0> level

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: I kinda mixed the effects with <modified, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: Removed

changes.name: NEW: Force of the Prism

texts.text: When <modified, abilities, basic, 2> Reaches maximum range it splits into three <modified, abilities, basic, 2>s and travels extra 25% range. Artanis Won't swap with targets pulled that way
subtexts: The other two prisms will be create at a 45ยบ angle difference, one to the left and another to the right

changes.developerCommentary: I was on a fight to decide between this or Longshot, a inspired reddit talent that made <modified, abilities, basic, 2> have a longer range and increased travel speed, i choose this because i think this could make great wtf moments
